function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"UV-C exposure time of only 5 minutes resulted in undetectable virus levels for MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.","Impact":"Effective disinfection may lead to a false sense of security and result in reduced adherence to other preventive measures.","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of combining UV-C disinfection with standard cleaning practices and other preventive measures.","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems with appropriate exposure times.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors in healthcare facilities.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management and infection control teams."},{"Description":"Whole-room UV-C system effectiveness against RNA viruses like MHV-A59, MERS-CoV, and SARS-CoV.","Impact":"Overreliance on UV-C disinfection without proper cleaning may lead to inadequate control of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Highlight that UV-C disinfection should be an adjunct to standard terminal cleaning of hard surfaces, not a replacement for it.","Technologies":"Multiple-emitter, automated, whole-room UV-C systems.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors in healthcare facilities.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management and infection control teams."},{"Description":"Use of the Surfacide whole-room UV-C disinfection system during MERS outbreaks may prevent nosocomial spread of the virus and protect staff.","Impact":"Dependence solely on UV-C disinfection without other preventive measures may lead to incomplete protection against nosocomial spread.","Mitigation":"Promote the use of UV-C disinfection as a complementary measure alongside other infection control strategies.","Technologies":"Surfacide whole-room UV-C disinfection system.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors in healthcare facilities.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management and infection control teams."}]}
